sentence.Network_en: Celebrate being alone, delight in yourself, dance in your aloneness.
sentence.Network_cn: 为孤独庆祝, 为自己高兴, 为你的孤独舞蹈.

sentence.Network_en: I am reading a book named No Fear in Aloneness >.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本是一本很好的书,是黑素所著的.

sentence.Network_en: When your loneliness becomes aloneness – that is freedom!
sentence.Network_cn: 当你孤独变得孤独-这是自由!

PerfectNetExp.abs: alogical 非逻辑的aloneness 孤独感aloofness 冷淡

list.abs: 是小鬼当家（HOME ALONE）么？凯文是一个大家庭中最年幼的成员，当他的家人飞往巴黎欢度耶诞时，他却意外地被遗下独自留在 …
博客来音乐馆&gt;森林芬多精 ... 1. Dewdrop / 露珠 2. Walking Alone / 一个人散步 3. Relaxation / 放松.
高二英语词汇表 ... financial adj. 财务的；金融的；财政的 leave alone 不打扰；不理会 insist vi. 坚持.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... in the least 一点(也不)，丝毫(不) leave alone 不管，不理会；不打扰 leave behind 丢弃；留下；忘记携带.
Let - 搜搜百科 ... leave/let sth alone 不碰；不变动；不移动 let alone 更不用说 leave/let sb/sth be 随…去；不打扰某人╱某事.
英语六级高频短语，词组 - 豆丁网 ... leave alone 不打扰,不干预 let alone 更别提,不打扰 lose heart 失去勇气,丧失信心.

auth_sentence.content: Putnam, in other words, saw public institutions as a casualty of the same forces of individuation driving modern aloneness.
